DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical study evaluate metrological property questionnaire aim identify vitamin D status reference vitamin D blood dosage .
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Questionnaire Vitamin D Insufficiency Healthy Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Each subject perform one visit ( visit V1 ) . The study duration per subject last 2 hour . During visit V1 , subject perform medical exam order check eligibility ( general statement check inclusion / non-inclusion criterion ) . The eligible subject fill study questionnaire perform blood sample dosage serum vitamin D .
DOC.criteria: Male female volunteer Subject able communicate investigator study team , able read write follow study instruction . Written inform consent provide sign prior screening , receive understand subject information . Registered French Social Security , agreement French law biomedical experimentation . Subject diagnose osteoporosis , osteopenia osteomalacia . Subject known disease contribute osteoporosis : Rheumatoid arthritis , Malabsorption syndrome , Inflammatory bowel disease , Hyperthyroidism , Hyperparathyroidism . Subject know hepatic impairment . Subject know liver impairment history renal transplantation . Subject history cancer . Subject history bariatric surgery . Subject take take osteoporosis induce treatment , treatment effect calcium phosphorus metabolism 3 month prior visit : Corticosteroids , Enzyme induce anticonvulsant , Heparin . Subject require vitamin D supplementation diagnose pathology . Pregnant breastfeed Female . Subject history alcohol drug abuse . Participation clinical trial simultaneously and/or end exclusion period another clinical trial . Subject legal age unable give consent . Subject deprive liberty judicial administrative decision . Subject legal age legal protection . Subject receive 4500 Euros clinical trial participation within prior year include indemnity present study .
